'use strict'

/**
 * Module exports.
 * @public
 */

module.exports = eventListenerCount

/**
 * Get the count of listeners on an event emitter of a specific type.
 */

function eventListenerCount(emitter, type) {
  return emitter.listeners(type).length
}
